title: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse
description: Bad 2 Bad: Apocalypse ‘, the official sequel to ‘Bad 2 Bad: Delta’ and ‘Extinction’, has been released on multiple platforms, featuring a boarder stage, vaster world and richer content. Apocalypse follows the story of the Delta Team, led by Major Pan, saving and reconstructing the world ravaged by a virus from the Human Forces. Join the Delta Team on their journey from survival to rebuilding the world. Voidwrought
